roleset.name: to plant too abundantly
roleset.note: OVERPLANT-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to plant.01. (from overplant.01-v)

example.name: Arg 1 only, passive
example.text: [Red Delicious]-1 has been overplanted *-1, and its prices have dropped below the cost of production.
